chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: The phone has a scratch/tear on the display - condition is excellent but doesn't fit. How do we deal with it now? Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer wants a replacement device, do you have one in stock? 

Regards,
Ebru from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer.

We are truly sorry that we are not able to provide you with a satisfactory outcome. Rather than sending a return for an exchange, would you consider a 50 euros commercial gesture instead to save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers to facilitate a return of a device without hardware issues?

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

The customer would like a replacement device. Do you have one in stock?

Regards,
Ebru from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are only able to check the availability of stock once the device has been returned to us.

Regards,
JH
